# <a name="turn-off-focused-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="d036f-102">關閉焦點收件匣</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d036f-102">Turn off Focused Inbox</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d036f-103">在頁面上，選取最頂端</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d036f-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d036f-104">若要開啟 [設定] 窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d036f-104">to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="d036f-105">在 [設定] 窗格中，移至關閉**焦點收件匣**切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d036f-105">In the Settings pane, move the **Focused Inbox** toggle to off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d036f-106">如需詳細資訊，請參閱[關閉焦點收件匣](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy#bkmk_outlookcom)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d036f-106">For more information, see [Turn off Focused Inbox](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy#bkmk_outlookcom).</span></span>
